mean_cn: adj.令人畏惧的；可怕的；难以克服的
mean_en: if people, things or situations are formidable, you feel fear and/or respect for them, because they are impressive or powerful, or because they seem very difficult
sentence: In ping-pong competition tournament, he was a formidable opponent.
sentence_trans: 在乒乓球比赛中，他是一位令人畏惧的对手。
word_etyma: formid=fear害怕 + able……的 → formidable可怕的
